/usr/bin/cc   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/particles.dir/particles.c.o CMakeFiles/particles.dir/__/deps/tinycthread.c.o CMakeFiles/particles.dir/__/deps/getopt.c.o CMakeFiles/particles.dir/__/deps/glad.c.o  -o particles -Wl,-rpath,/home/iot01/yugong_installer/third_party/glfw/src ../src/libglfw.so.3.2 -lm -lpthread -lrt
